answers.answer: IOM Romania provides free consultations from a family doctor, psychologist, and gynecologist.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Refugees can receive free medical care by first making an appointment with IOM representatives at their office located in RomExpo.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: IOM Romania's medical services are available Monday to Friday, from 9:00 to 17:00.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The IOM medical assistance center is located at RomExpo, specifically at Meresti Boulevard 65-67, Bucharest 011465.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Through IOM Romania, you can get consultations from a family doctor, psychologist, and gynecologist.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: To get an appointment with an IOM doctor, you must first make an appointment with the IOM representatives in their office located in RomExpo.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: All doctors are English speakers, and you can request a free translator for assistance.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.
